sentences.english: Besides, it's made up of interlocking musical sequences.
sentences.chinese: 再說，整部電影都是由環環相扣的音樂曲目組成。

sentences.english: And a more closely linked one between chi-chi of JieDe riddle.
sentences.chinese: 而一集集之間更是一個個環環相扣的謎語揭底。
